metadata.title: CVE-2020-27829 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A heap based buffer overflow in coders/tiff.c may result in program crashand denial of service in ImageMagick before 7.0.10-45.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
